entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
